title: Chicken with Dumplings
ingredients: ['1 (1.35kg) whole chicken', '1 onion, chopped', '1 stick celery with leaves', '1 tablespoon chicken seasoning', '1 teaspoon whole allspice', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon seasoning salt', '1 (295g) tin cream of chicken condensed soup', 'DUMPLINGS', '4 eggs', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '475ml water', '500g plain flour']
